reasoning: Global age-standardized incidence rate of UTIs 5,531.88 per 100,000 person-years (2021 GBD data). Incidence higher in women (5,000-10,000 per 100k) than men (60-80 per 100k). Estimates based on large epidemiological studies from multiple countries. Well-documented condition with robust surveillance data.
source: Epidemiological trends and predictions of urinary tract infections in the global burden of disease study 2021; Nature Scientific Reports.
